channel.title: Custom items aren't working
channel.description: I've been messing around with the ints for the vesta spear because it's not going in to my hand, it just goes under it, here's what I mean [IMG]http://i707.photobucket.com/albums/ww76/Jakesta96/glitch3.jpg[/img] I've raised the up/down int by 150 and it still hasn't moved up. What do I do?

item.title: Custom items aren't working
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

What you will need to do is re-position the weild model in Meta. Just go and post in models section, pre-warning you will get 1-2 noobs flaming you saying this is client help, but in models section you WILL get a small tutorial on it. Or at least some better direction than you wil get here.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom items aren't working
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

okay, you up and down ints aren’t the problem. all that does is change the up and down of you inventory model. i cant remember what i was going to say what it was… go to the modeling section and ask some one there, since this is more model side then your client side… It could be your server side, did you put it under the staff thingy or whatever… cant remember now.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom items aren't working
